title: A Half million teenagers
brief_description: Studies the physiology aspects of venereal disease. Uses animation to show how the organisms of gonorrhea and syphilis enter and affect the body and how the diseases may be recognised. Stresses the need for treatment, pointing out that there is a cure for both diseases.
